title: "spack reindex" fails with "invalid ref count"
body:
A previous install of `git` failed, leaving a half-installed `git` ghost. This is usually remedied via `spack reindex`, but this fails here.

My original command is:

```
$ spack install -v julia
==> Installing julia
==> git is already installed in /home/eschnett/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spack/git-2.9.3-kgah4b5gurqx2rswlt44xoinshfw7doi
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/bin/spack", line 192, in <module>
    main()
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/bin/spack", line 169, in main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 92, in install
    explicit=True)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 919, in do_install
    run_tests=run_tests)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1069, in do_install_dependencies
    dep.package.do_install(**kwargs)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 901, in do_install
    rec = spack.installed_db.get_record(self.spec)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 75, in converter
    return function(self, spec_like, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 521, in get_record
    key = self._get_matching_spec_key(spec, **kwargs)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 516, in _get_matching_spec_key
    raise KeyError("No such spec in database! %s" % spec)
KeyError: 'No such spec in database! git@2.9.3%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^autoconf@2.69%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^curl@7.50.1%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^expat@2.2.0%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^gettext@0.19.8.1%gcc@6.1.0-spack+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^libsigsegv@2.10%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^libxml2@2.9.4%gcc@6.1.0-spack~python arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^m4@1.4.17%gcc@6.1.0-spack+sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^ncurses@6.0%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^openssl@1.0.2h%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^pcre@8.39%gcc@6.1.0-spack+utf arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^perl@5.24.0%gcc@6.1.0-spack+cpanm arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^tar@1.29%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^xz@5.2.2%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64^zlib@1.2.8%gcc@6.1.0-spack arch=linux-centos7-x86_64'
```

To remedy, I try to reindex:

```
$ spack reindex
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/bin/spack", line 192, in <module>
    main()
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/bin/spack", line 169, in main
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/reindex.py", line 31, in reindex
    spack.installed_db.reindex(spack.install_layout)
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 375, in reindex
    self._check_ref_counts()
  File "/home/eschnett/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/database.py", line 407, in _check_ref_counts
    (key, found, expected, self._index_path))
AssertionError: Invalid ref_count: 3f2b2nmz2brdouohnoxiik3zch7d4v7p: 31 (expected 30), in DB /home/eschnett/src/spack/opt/spack/.spack-db/index.yaml
```
